content: The cave is very dark, but you'll be able to see the faint glow of a green Wisp to the left and lava to the right. Head for the lava, to find a Revenant Charbone, but also a pathway that leads outside.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Father of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
The cave is very dark, but you'll be able to see the faint glow of a green Wisp to the left and lava to the right. Head for the lava, to find a Revenant Charbone, but also a pathway that leads outside.
